Articles.Content:
My challenge? Use the gravity from one planet to get to another.

Post pictures or videos, but pictures need:

1. Showing the orbit entering the planet

2. Showing the orbit leaving the planet.

3. Show the new planet.

I am all over trying this! I used the Mun to gravity assist me to Duna in my first .17 mission (videos here). I've been thinking of trying to use Duna to assist me to Juul, I'll let you know if I manage it!
Do you mean a completely unpowered assist? I gravity assist all the time but that's going to be a neat trick. I'm going to give it a shot.
